_field_long_integer.name: ordnance points#The number of ordnance points that are awarded to the player when they earn this medal.

_field_byte_integer.name: ordnance multiplier#The ordnance multiplier to add to players ordnance multiplier when they earn this medal.
tier index#the tier that this medal belongs to

_field_short_integer.name: override point value#if greater than zero, this point value will be awarded to players instead of the tier's point value
